name: Constellator
description:
Tiny thing where you can draw some constellations for fun!

Controls: Q, E, A, S, D

Made for The Sylvie Shuffle, the best game jam to ever happen https://twitter.com/sylviefluff/status/1286406459841024011

Font is m5x7 by Daniel Linssen: https://managore.itch.io/m5x7

Made using GameMaker: Studio 1.4
